103        cml.info("        版本代号: " + SwInfoc.VerCodename);
104        cml.info("        支持协议: " + SwInfoc.connection);
105        cml.info("");
106        cml.info("当前运行本核心的发行版: " + DistributionName);
107        cml.info("");
108        cml.info("如果遇到核心问题，请提交至: https://github.com/deplayeris/coffeeirc/issues");
109        cml.info("如在使用基于本核心的发行版(如无忧聊)时出现问题");
110        cml.info("请先检查是否为核心故障(通过查看核心日志)，若非核心问题请联系发行版作者");
111        cml.info("");
112        cml.info("核心问题提交步骤:");
113        cml.info("1. 在GitHub上创建新的Issue");
114        cml.info("2. 详细准确地描述遇到的问题");

121        this.username = username;

124        cml.info("[配置详情] IP协议版本: IPv" + ipProtocol);

126        cml.info("[用户信息] 用户昵称: " + nickname);
127        cml.info("[用户信息] 用户名: " + username);
128        cml.info("[实例创建] 客户端实例已成功创建并配置完成");
129
130        initializeChatLog();
131
132        startPushService();
133
134        initializeEncryption(customKey);
135
136    }
137    /**记录聊天日志所必须要使用的一个Method*/
138    private void initializeChatLog() {
139        try {
140            currentChatLogDate = LocalDate.now().toString();
141            String logFileName = "./ciclogs/chatlog-c-" + currentChatLogDate + ".log";
142            FileWriter fileWriter = new FileWriter(logFileName, true);
143            chatLogWriter = new PrintWriter(fileWriter, true);
144            
145            cml.info("[聊天日志] 聊天日志系统已初始化，日志文件: " + logFileName);
146            
147        } catch (IOException e) {
148            cml.error("[聊天日志错误] 初始化聊天日志失败: " + e.getMessage());
149        }
150    }
151
152    ///记录聊天消息
153    /// @param username 用户名
154    /// @param message 消息
155    private void logChatMessage(String username, String message) {
156        try {
157            String today = LocalDate.now().toString();
158            if (!today.equals(currentChatLogDate)) {
159                closeChatLog();
160                initializeChatLog();
161            }
162            
163            if (chatLogWriter != null) {
164                String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(chatLogFormatter);
165                String logEntry = timestamp + " [ " + username + " ] " + message;
166                chatLogWriter.println(logEntry);
167                chatLogWriter.flush();
168            }
169        } catch (Exception e) {
170            cml.error("[聊天日志错误] 记录聊天消息失败: " + e.getMessage());
171        }
172    }
173
174    /**初始化加密系统*/
175    private void initializeEncryption(String customKey) {
176        try {
177            cml.info("[加密初始化] 开始初始化加密通讯系统...");
178
179            KeyPairGenerator keyGen = KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
180            if (customKey != null && !customKey.isEmpty()) {
181                // 使用自定义密钥种子
182                SecureRandom secureRandom = SecureRandom.getInstance("SHA1PRNG");
183                secureRandom.setSeed(customKey.getBytes("UTF-8"));
184                keyGen.initialize(2048, secureRandom);
185                cml.info("[加密初始化] 使用自定义密钥种子初始化加密系统");
186            } else {
187                keyGen.initialize(2048, new SecureRandom());
188                cml.info("[加密初始化] 使用随机密钥初始化加密系统");
189            }
190            rsaKeyPair = keyGen.generateKeyPair();
191            
192            cml.info("[加密初始化] RSA密钥对生成成功");
193            
194        } catch (Exception e) {
195            cml.error("[加密错误] 初始化加密系统失败: " + e.getMessage());
196        }
197    }
198    
199    /**AES加密消息*/
200    private String encryptMessage(String message) {
201        try {
202            if (!encryptionEnabled || aesKey == null) {
203                return message;
204            }
205            
206            Cipher cipher = Cipher.getInstance("AES");
207            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, aesKey);
208            byte[] encryptedBytes = cipher.doFinal(message.getBytes("UTF-8"));
209            return Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(encryptedBytes);
210            
211        } catch (Exception e) {
212            cml.error("[加密错误] 消息加密失败: " + e.getMessage());
213            return message;//如果加密失败，就直接返回原文我不管了
214        }
215    }
216    
217    /**解密AES密钥*/
218    private void decryptAesKey(String encryptedAesKeyStr) {
219        try {
220            byte[] encryptedKeyBytes = Base64.getDecoder().decode(encryptedAesKeyStr);
221            Cipher cipher = Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
222            cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, rsaKeyPair.getPrivate());
223            byte[] decryptedKeyBytes = cipher.doFinal(encryptedKeyBytes);
224            
225            aesKey = new SecretKeySpec(decryptedKeyBytes, "AES");
226            cml.info("[密钥交换] AES密钥解密成功");
227            
228        } catch (Exception e) {
229            cml.error("[密钥交换错误] AES密钥解密失败: " + e.getMessage());
230        }
231    }
232    
233    /**AES解密消息*/
234    private String decryptMessage(String encryptedMessage) {
235        try {
236            if (!encryptionEnabled || aesKey == null) {
237                return encryptedMessage;
238            }
239            
240            byte[] decodedBytes = Base64.getDecoder().decode(encryptedMessage);
241            Cipher cipher = Cipher.getInstance("AES");
242            cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, aesKey);
243            byte[] decryptedBytes = cipher.doFinal(decodedBytes);
244            return new String(decryptedBytes, "UTF-8");
245            
246        } catch (Exception e) {
247            cml.error("[解密错误] 消息解密失败: " + e.getMessage());
248            return encryptedMessage;
249        }
250    }
251    
252    /**在使用完毕之后，必须关闭聊天日志记录*/
253    private void closeChatLog() {
254        if (chatLogWriter != null) {
255            chatLogWriter.close();
256            chatLogWriter = null;
257            cml.info("[聊天日志] 聊天日志文件已关闭");
258        }
259    }
260
261    /**这个推送服务是用来接收服务器广播消息、客户端发送请求到服务端执行动作的，因此，必须启动*/
262    private void startPushService() {
263        try {
264            pushServer = HttpServer.create(new InetSocketAddress(pushPort), 0);
265            pushServer.createContext("/push", new PushHandler());
266            pushServer.setExecutor(null);
267            pushServer.start();
268            cml.info("[推送服务] 推送服务已在端口 " + pushPort + " 启动");
269        } catch (IOException e) {
270            cml.error("[推送服务错误] 启动推送服务失败: " + e.getMessage());
271        }
272    }
273
274    /**在使用完毕之后，必须关闭推送服务*/
275    private void stopPushService() {
276        if (pushServer != null) {
277            pushServer.stop(0);
278            pushServer = null;
279            cml.info("[推送服务] 推送服务已停止");
280        }
281    }
282
283    /**推送处理器类*/
284    class PushHandler implements HttpHandler {
285        @Override
286        /**处理推送消息的处理器*/
287        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
288            //至于为什么使用 push 而不使用 pull这个命名，这是受到 github 的熏陶（pull request就是由push者发送）
289            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
290                try {
291                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
292                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
293                    inputStream.close();
294                    
295                    cml.info("[推送接收] 收到推送消息: " + requestBody);
296                    
297                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\"}";
298                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
299                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
300                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
301                    os.write(response.getBytes());
302                    os.close();
303                    
304                } catch (Exception e) {
305                    cml.error("[推送错误] 处理推送消息时出错: " + e.getMessage());
306                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\"}";
307                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
308                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
309                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
310                    os.write(response.getBytes());
311                    os.close();//这里就是一坨灾难
312                }
313            } else {
314                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
315                exchange.close();
316            }
317        }
318    }
319
320    /**连接*/
321    public void Connect() {
322        cml.info("[连接] 尝试连接到服务器 http://" + ip + ":" + port + " (用户: " + username + ")");
323        
324        try {
325            String serverUrl = "http://" + ip + ":" + port;
326
327            String publicKeyStr = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(rsaKeyPair.getPublic().getEncoded());
328            String connectRequest = "{\"nickname\":\"" + nickname + "\",\"username\":\"" + username + "\",\"publicKey\":\"" + publicKeyStr + "\"}";
329            
330            HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
331                    .uri(URI.create(serverUrl + "/connect"))
332                    .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(30))
333                    .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
334                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(connectRequest))
335                    .build();
336            
337            HttpResponse<String> response = clientHttp.send(request, 
338                    HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());
339            
340            if (response.statusCode() == 200) {
341                String responseBody = response.body();
342
343                if (responseBody.contains("\"clientId\":\"")) {
344                    int start = responseBody.indexOf("\"clientId\":\"") + 12;
345                    int end = responseBody.indexOf("\"", start);
346                    if (end > start) {
347                        clientId = responseBody.substring(start, end);
348                    }
349                }
350                
351
352                if (responseBody.contains("\"serverPublicKey\":\"")) {
353                    // 这里只是一个简化处理，在实际生产环境开发中，额你应该解析服务器公钥
354                    // 更好的意见的话，希望你可以给我提供，因为我在加密开发商真的不擅长 -- by Deplayer515
355                    cml.info("[加密握手] 已接收服务器公钥");
356                }
357                
358                if (responseBody.contains("\"encryptedAesKey\":\"")) {
359                    int start = responseBody.indexOf("\"encryptedAesKey\":\"") + 19;
360                    int end = responseBody.indexOf("\"", start);
361                    if (end > start) {
362                        String encryptedAesKeyStr = responseBody.substring(start, end);
363                        decryptAesKey(encryptedAesKeyStr);
364                    }
365                }
366                
367                isConnected = true;
368                encryptionEnabled = (aesKey != null);
369                cml.info("[连接成功] 已连接到服务器，客户端ID: " + clientId);
370                cml.info("[加密状态] 加密通讯: " + (encryptionEnabled ? "已启用" : "未启用"));
371                
372            } else {
373                cml.error("[连接失败] 状态码: " + response.statusCode() + ", 响应: " + response.body());
374            }
375            
376        } catch (Exception e) {
377            cml.error("[连接异常] " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + e.getMessage());
378            if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
379                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
380            }
381        }
382    }
383
384    /// 发送消息
385    /// @param message 要发送的消息
386    public void sendMessage(String message) {
387        if (!isConnected) {
388            cml.warn("[发送失败] 客户端未连接");
389            return;
390        }
391
392        String encryptedMessage = encryptMessage(message);
393        cml.info("[发送] '" + nickname + "' 发送消息: " + (encryptionEnabled ? "[已加密]" : "") + message);
394        
395        logChatMessage(nickname, message);
396        
397        try {
398            String serverUrl = "http://" + ip + ":" + port;
399            String requestBody = "{\"nickname\":\"" + nickname + "\",\"message\":\"" + encryptedMessage + "\"";
400            
401
402            if (clientId != null && !clientId.isEmpty()) {
403                requestBody = requestBody.substring(0, requestBody.length() - 1) + ",\"clientId\":\"" + clientId + "\"}";
404            }
405            
406            HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
407                    .uri(URI.create(serverUrl + "/message"))
408                    .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(10))
409                    .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
410                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(requestBody))
411                    .build();
412            
413            HttpResponse<String> response = clientHttp.send(request, 
414                    HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());
415            
416            if (response.statusCode() == 200) {
417                cml.info("[发送成功] 消息已送达服务器");
418            } else {
419                cml.error("[发送失败] 状态码: " + response.statusCode() + ", 响应: " + response.body());
420            }
421            
422        } catch (Exception e) {
423            cml.error("[发送异常] " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + e.getMessage());
424            if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
425                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
426            }
427        }
428    }
429
430    /**断开连接*/
431    public void disconnect() {
432        if (!isConnected) {
433            cml.warn("[断开失败] 客户端未连接");
434            return;
435        }
436
437        cml.info("[断开] '" + nickname + "' 正在断开连接");
438
439        try {
440            String serverUrl = "http://" + ip + ":" + port;
441            String requestBody = "{\"nickname\":\"" + nickname + "\"";
442
443            if (clientId != null && !clientId.isEmpty()) {
444                requestBody = requestBody.substring(0, requestBody.length() - 1) + ",\"clientId\":\"" + clientId + "\"}";
445            }
446
447            HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
448                    .uri(URI.create(serverUrl + "/disconnect"))
449                    .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(10))
450                    .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(requestBody))
451                    .build();
452
453            HttpResponse<String> response = clientHttp.send(request,
454                    HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());
455
456            if (response.statusCode() == 200) {
457                cml.info("[断开成功] 已从服务器断开");
458
459                isConnected = false;
460                clientId = null;
461                closeChatLog();
462                stopPushService();
463                stopPushService();
464            } else {
465                cml.warn("[断开异常] 状态码: " + response.statusCode());
466                isConnected = false;
467                clientId = null;
468                closeChatLog();
469                stopPushService();
470            }
471
472        } catch (Exception e) {
473            cml.error("[断开异常] " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + e.getMessage());
474            isConnected = false;
475            clientId = null;
476            closeChatLog();
477            stopPushService();
478            
479            if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
480                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
481            }
482        }
483
484    }
